name: UnoTheActivist
description: '''Troy Vashon Donte Lane''' (born April 13, 1996), known professionally as '''UnoTheActivist''' (also known as '''The Act''') is an American rapper and singer from [[Atlanta, Georgia]]. He is also known for his collaborations with fellow Atlanta rappers [[Thouxanbanfauni]] and [[Playboi Carti]].
